EmailTemplate.name: TriCON 2012.ETI Cocktail Hour
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited (RSVP Required) to TriCON Dessert Reception sponsored by Emergency Technologies, Inc.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Join Emergency Technologies, Inc. (ETI) for a Complimentary Dessert Reception Wednesday, September 26 from 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM Hello {{lead.First Name:default=TriCON Attendee}},
You are invited to join TriCON Sponsor, Emergency Technologies, Inc. <http://www.emergencytechnologies.com> (ETI), as they host a dessert and drink reception at the 207 Lounge located in the Hard Rock Hotel San Diego! RSVP today <mailto:lmatthews@emergencytechnologies.com> to guarantee your spot at this capacity controlled event.
We look forward to seeing you there!
<http://www.emergencytechnologies.com> EVENT DETAILS See You There! Date: Wednesday, Sept. 26, 2012
Time: 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM
Where: Hard Rock Hotel San Diego 207 Lounge 207 Fifth Avenue, San Diego The Hard Rock Hotel <http://www.hardrockhotelsd.com/> is a brief 10-minute walk from the Hilton San Diego Bayfront
<http://www.hardrockhotelsd.com/>
